title: Podcast 379: Why you don't need to hustle to have a fulfilling life + how to quit the "cult"of hustle for good
description:
Sign up to Patreon to get access to bonus ad-free podcasts, exclusive downloads, live Q&As and more: https://www.patreon.com/drcarolineleaf 

EPISODE DESCRIPTION: In this podcast I talk to former Wall Street lawyer and top podcast host Jordan Harbinger about hustle culture, burnout, and so much more! In a recent blog, Jordan talked about “hustle culture” and how it affects our mental and physical well-being, and quality of life. Hustle culture is a term used to refer to the “rise and grind” attitude of work, work, work. It is what Jordan calls the “the ethos of constantly working your butt off in the pursuit of some vague goal, no matter the cost”.  

Read the blog here: https://drleaf.com/blogs/news/why-you-don-t-need-to-hustle-to-have-a-fulfilling-life  

Jordan's blog: https://www.jordanharbinger.com/why-hustle-culture-makes-you-miserable-and-how-to-break-out-of-it/  

And for more info on Jordan and to listen to his podcast: https://jordanharbinger.com/start and https://jordanharbinger.com/podcast for the podcast  


OFFERS FROM OUR SPONSORS: 

-Nootropics by BiOptimizers: ust go to https://nootopia.com/drleaf and enter coupon code DRLEAF10 for an extra 10% off your order, and experience your best mood and mental performance with personalized Nootropics! 

 -BetterHelp: am proud to say that this podcast is sponsored by BetterHelp, and Cleaning Up the Mental Mess listeners get 10% off their first month at https://betterhelp.com/drleaf. 

 -Best Fiends: Download Best Fiends FREE today on the Apple App Store or Google Play.   


EPISODE HIGHLIGHTS: 

3:00 Jordan’s past job as a lawyer & why he changed professions 

5:30 Hustle culture: what is it & how it hurts us

8:05 The danger of thinking “if I am just motivated enough…” 

12:00 How hustle culture acts like a cult 

12:32 Work is not the only way to have a fulfilling life! 

13:10 Hustle culture & religion 

15:10 How hustle culture preys on human impulses 

17:40 How people who sell hustle culture ideas keep us coming back for more 

20:20 Empowerment versus entrapment 

21:00 How hustle culture lies to us 

24:00 Working more does not always = working better 

27:30 Hustle culture & the self-help industry 29:00 Creativity versus hustle vulture 

31:00, 44:20 How to quit hustle culture 

35:15 Why hustle culture wants us feel like failures 

47:10 The power of creating your own values
